titles.title: Providing a sense of the Congress that the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 1996 should reach a balanced Federal budget by fiscal year 2001 through expenditure reductions and not tax increases.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Budget.

bill.summary: 5/23/1995--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that the concurrent resolution on the budget for FY 1996 should reach a balanced Federal budget by FY 2001 through expenditure reductions without tax increases.
